de.ralleytn.simple.vecmath

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.vecmath.Vector<Vector2>
      • de.ralleytn.simple.vecmath.Vector2

  • public final class Vector2
extends Vector<Vector2>
    Represents a two dimensional vector.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

      • dot

        public final float dot(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the dot product of this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation.
        Returns:
        x * x2 + y + y2
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • angle

        public final float angle(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the angle between this vector and another one in radians.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        acos(min(max(dot(b) / (a.length() * b.length()), -1), 1))
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • cross

        public final float cross(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the cross product between this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        x * y2 - y * x2
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • rotate

        public final Vector2 rotate(float angle)
        Rotates this vector.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in degrees
        Returns:
        x2 = x
        x = x2 * cos(angle) - y * sin(angle)
        y = x2 * sin(angle) + y * cos(angle)
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • turnLeft

        public final Vector2 turnLeft()
        Rotates this vector 90° to the left.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Returns:
        y = x
        x = -y
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • turnRight

        public final Vector2 turnRight()
        Rotates this vector 90° to the right.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Returns:
        x = y
        y = -x
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • multiply

        public final Vector2 multiply(Matrix3 matrix)
        Multiplies this vector with a three dimensional matrix.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Parameters:
        matrix - the three dimensional matrix
        Returns:
        x = x * m00 + y * m01
        y = y * m10 + y * m11
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • multiply

        public final Vector2 multiply(Matrix4 matrix)
        Multiplies this vector with a four dimensional matrix.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Parameters:
        matrix - matrix the four dimensional matrix
        Returns:
        x = x * m00 + y * m01
        y = y * m10 + y * m11
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • distanceSquared

        public final float distanceSquared(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the squared distance between this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        (x - x2)² + (y - y2)²
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • distance

        public final float distance(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the distance between this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        sqrt(distanceSquared(Vector2))
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • distanceL1

        public final float distanceL1(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the L-1 (Manhattan) distance between this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        abs(x - x2) + abs(y - y2)
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • distanceLinf

        public final float distanceLinf(Vector2 b)
        Calculates the L-infinite distance between this vector and another two dimensional vector.
        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        Returns:
        max(abs(x - x2), abs(y - y2))
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • toVector3

        public final Vector3 toVector3()
        Converts this vector from a two dimensional to a three dimensional one. The missing elements will be filled with 0.0F.
        Returns:
        the three dimensional vector
        Since:
        1.0.0

        1.0.0

        Returns:
        the quaternion
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • epsilonEquals

        public final boolean epsilonEquals(Vector2 b,
                                   float epsilon)
        Returns true if the L-infinite distance between this vector and the other one is less than or equal to the epsilon parameter, else false
        Parameters:
        b - the vector that is compared with this vector
        epsilon - the threshold value
        Returns:
        (abs(x2 - x) <= epsilon) AND (abs(y2 - y) <= epsilon)
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • interpolate

        public final Vector2 interpolate(Vector2 b,
                                 float alpha)
        Linearly interpolates between this and another two dimensional vector.

        this instance will be manipulated

        Parameters:
        b - the vector on the right side of the calculation
        alpha - the alpha interpolation parameter
        Returns:
        beta = 1.0F - alpha
        x = beta * x + alpha * x2
        y = beta * y + alpha * y2
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • clampMin

        public final Vector2 clampMin(float min)
        Description copied from class: Vector
        Clamps this vector to the given minimum value. this instance will be manipulated

        Specified by:
        clampMin in class Vector<Vector2>
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum value
        Returns:
        FOREACH element in elements DO IF element < min THEN element = min

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Description copied from class: Vector
        Sets all elements of this vector to their absolute value. this instance will be manipulated

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • lengthSquared

        public final float lengthSquared()
        Description copied from class: Vector
        Calculates the length of this vector according to Pythagoras (a² + b² = c²). The result of this method is the squared length of the vector's hypotenuse.
        Specified by:
        lengthSquared in class Vector<Vector2>
        Returns:
        FOREACH element in elements DO lengthSquared = lengthSquared + element²

      • negate

        Description copied from class: Vector

        this instance will be manipulated

        Specified by:
        negate in class Vector<Vector2>
        Returns:
        FOREACH element in elements DO element = -element

        scale in class Vector<Vector2>
        Parameters:
        scale - the scalar value
        Returns:
